Name: Investigate the Vine Attacks
Content: Status: Completed. Given by Auntie Belba Mossfoot in Session 01 after the Ogre attack at the Sunreach Festival. Goal: Investigate rumors about vines attacking carts heading into Sunreach from the west and speak with Myrtle in the swamp. Notable casualties: Gurruk the Ogre (killed in initial attack). Reward: 200 gp total, plus an additional 50 gp for reporting back to Myrtle.

Name: Find Billy the Treant
Content: Status: Completed. Personal quest for Fern, initiated in backstory. Goal: Locate Fern's missing walking tree companion, Billy. Notable casualties: None. Reward: Emotional resolution and reunion; Billy now serves as the voice of the party's Bastion.

Name: Find Rynn
Content: Status: Completed. Personal quest for Nira, initiated in Session 01. Goal: Locate the half-elven man named Rynn who was last seen in Mistlake/Drak'Moru. Notable casualties: None. Reward: Emotional reunion; Rynn was found safe in Snagroot Village working with Bee Rexes.

Name: Clear Colm's Name
Content: Status: In Progress. Personal quest for Colm, ongoing since Session 01. Goal: Prove Colm was framed for poisoning during the Royal Summit Tournament and identify the true conspirators. Notable casualties: None yet. Reward: Freedom from bounty and revenge; currently learned that Tyber is alive, Noa Youtil may be the real target, and Varyn Crowsblood was involved.

Name: Deal with the Bullywugs
Content: Status: Completed. Given by Mawmaw Roux in Session 10 in Mudwater Bend. Goal: Clear the Bullywugs from the Hollow Pools who were causing trouble. Notable casualties: Sage Splup the Slime and his Bullywugs; a Gatorougarou that appeared during the fight. Reward: Payment and gratitude from Mawmaw Roux and the town.

Name: Stop the Emberfang Kobolds
Content: Status: Completed. Given by Branver Emberbrush and the Wildrunner elders in Session 15. Goal: Deal with the fire-loving kobolds who were raiding and bothering the tribe, and rescue captured Bee Rexes. Notable casualties: Multiple Emberfang Kobolds, a Half-red Dragon Allosaurus, Red Slaads, Tunnel Howlers, and a half Red-Dragon Indominus Rex. Reward: Personal rewards for each party member, improved relations with Wildrunner Clan.

Name: Find Tamson in Petalmere
Content: Status: Completed. Given by Elder Myla in Session 08 in Petalmere. Goal: Locate Tamson who went missing in the wildflower fields connected to the Feywild. Notable casualties: None. Reward: 200 gp each, free lodging and meals for a week in Petalmere.

Name: Investigate the Mysterious Stone
Content: Status: Completed. Taken from job board in Session 05, investigated in Session 07 in Emberfell. Goal: Investigate the glowing stone dug up on Maeven's farm that was causing strange occurrences. Notable casualties: Creatures in the mushroom cavern, an Ashy Entity. Reward: 100 gp from Maeven Thornholt.

Name: Deliver Brack's Barrel
Content: Status: Completed. Given by brewmaster Brack in Session 11. Goal: Deliver one barrel to the Wildrunner outpost, don't shake it, and ignore it if it sings. Notable casualties: Multiple raptors, Stormseed Broodlings encountered during the journey. Reward: 100 gp and a bag of holding.

Name: Investigate the Lunar Corruption
Content: Status: Ongoing. Emergent main story quest developing through multiple sessions. Goal: Understand and stop the lunar rot/night sickness that is corrupting creatures and land, connected to something from the moon that broke off long ago. Notable casualties: Various corrupted creatures including Gurruk, Bloody Bones, Bog Bodies, corrupted humanoid, Echo Wraith, Moonshadow Beast, zombies, Waxling, Candlekin. Reward: Ongoing; crucial for world salvation.

Name: Rescue Stolen Bee Rexes
Content: Status: Completed. Taken from job board in Session 05, accomplished during Emberfang campaign. Goal: Find and rescue Bee Rexes that were stolen in the night from the Wildrunners. Notable casualties: Emberfang Kobolds involved in the poaching operation. Reward: Implied gratitude and rewards from Wildrunner Clan, bee balm poultice.

Name: Investigate Thick Wildflower Fields
Content: Status: Completed. Taken from job board in Session 05, resolved in Session 08 in Petalmere. Goal: Investigate why wildflower fields are thicker than they should be and missing gatherers. Notable casualties: None. Reward: Integrated into the Tamson rescue reward (200 gp each).

Name: Explore Uncovered Crypt
Content: Status: Completed. Investigated in Session 28. Goal: Investigate a crypt uncovered by violent tides that someone had poked at but not properly explored. Notable casualties: A group of undead, including a moon-touched leader. Reward: Ring of Water Walking, and the satisfaction of laying the dead to rest.

Name: Find Missing Storyteller
Content: Status: Failed. The party investigated in Session 27 by visiting the beach where Tom Bouldertstep's walking stick washed ashore. After a brief examination, they concluded he was beyond rescue. The quest was rendered moot when Tom returned to town days later, found naked and confused. Notable casualties: None. Reward: None.

Name: Uncover Zara's Heritage
Content: Status: Ongoing. Personal quest for Zara, developing throughout the campaign. Goal: Learn about her infernal father and her Pallid Elf heritage, particularly the connection to the Nine Hells gateway in Sian'dorai. Notable casualties: None directly. Reward: Personal closure and understanding of her powers and destiny.

Name: Arya's Binding Contract
Content: Status: Completed. Personal quest for Arya, spanning 60 years of his life before the campaign. Goal: Form a binding contract with intelligent beings to fulfill his purpose as a Guardian fairy. Notable casualties: None. Reward: Fulfillment of his life's purpose, ability to convert stamina into fairy dust, and acceptance by his clan.

Name: Festival Mischief Games
Content: Status: Completed. Self-initiated during Session 05 at the Sunreach Midsummer Festival. Goal: Complete a list of mischief tasks including winning an owlbear's trust, hitting a magical dartboard, capturing a goose, pie eating contest, making a bard laugh, finding 'The Egg,' and recapturing escaped waterfowl. Notable casualties: None. Reward: Gift basket and 50 gp from Auntie Belba.

Name: Investigate Missing Goat
Content: Status: Available. Mentioned in Session 10 in Mudwater Bend. Goal: Find a missing goat in the area. Notable casualties: None yet. Reward: Unknown; potentially superseded by more urgent matters.

Name: Deal with the Rougarou/Gatorougarou
Content: Status: Completed. Emergent during Session 10 after the Bullywug fight. Goal: Deal with the wolf-like creature (actually a Gatorougarou) that was attracted by the blood from the Bullywug battle. Notable casualties: The Gatorougarou. Reward: Included in Mawmaw Roux's reward for dealing with the Bullywugs.

Name: Find Wishing Well Answers
Content: Status: Completed. Self-initiated in Session 08 at Petalmere's wishing well. Goal: Use Drowzel's wishing well to gain crucial information about each party member's personal quests. Notable casualties: None. Reward: Vital information about Billy's location, Zara's father, Rynn's whereabouts, and Colm's framer.

Name: Investigate Leshy Mischief
Content: Status: Completed. Given by Branver Emberbrush in Session 14. Goal: Investigate who was moving food and tools and leaving rare herbs in return, suspected to be Leshy plant people. Notable casualties: None. Reward: Information about the lunar corruption and medicinal herbs from Murmura.

Name: Stoneball Classic Tournament
Content: Status: Completed. Participated in Session 28. Goal: Participate in the Stoneball Classic tournament. Notable casualties: None. Reward: 15 gold pieces and local acclaim (amidst some embarrassment).

Name: Investigate Retired Wrestling Champions Brawl
Content: Status: Available. Mentioned by Elder Marrin in Session 27 as a local event in Stonehaven Shores. Goal: Deal with retired wrestling champions who started an open brawl. Notable casualties: None yet. Reward: Unknown.

Name: Find Brynd's Necromancer
Content: Status: Ongoing. Personal quest for Brynd, self-declared in Session 27. Goal: Find a necromancer who can answer how stupid one must be to lack a soul, following philosophical discussions about snakes and goblins having souls. Notable casualties: None yet. Reward: Philosophical answers about soulhood thresholds.

Name: Protect Noa Youtil
Content: Status: Ongoing. Emergent from Session 27 investigation. Goal: Protect Noa Youtil (the duelist who helped Colm escape) who may be the real target of the conspirators who framed Colm. Notable casualties: None yet. Reward: Preventing an innocent person from being harmed and gaining an ally against the conspirators.

Name: Test Skills in Zepharok Arena
Content: Status: Available. Mentioned in Session 27 as a potential stop on the way north to Itinit. Goal: Test the party's combat skills in the arena at Zepharok. Notable casualties: None yet. Reward: Arena prizes and reputation.

Name: Find the Glowing Stone from Vaelzareth
Content: Status: Completed (as part of Mysterious Stone quest). Taken from job board in Session 05, resolved in Session 07. Goal: Investigate a glowing stone that was dug up on the edge of Vaelzareth that mentioned whispers. Notable casualties: None directly. Reward: Integrated into the Emberfell stone investigation reward.

Name: Supply Transport Mission
Content: Status: Available. Mentioned in Session 10 as a potential future mission in Drak'Moru. Goal: Transport supplies to locations in Drak'Moru. Notable casualties: None yet. Reward: Unknown; potentially similar to Brack's barrel delivery.

Name: Silence the Crystal Shard
Content: Status: In Progress. Given by the Triton leader Neressa. Goal: Find and silence/destroy the humming crystal shard that is poisoning the sea below Zepharok, corrupting the tides and turning sea guardians hostile. The party has cleared the initial ancient coral ruins and learned more from journals found there.
